item.title: Kubernetes for everyone
item.description: Hola, a friend of mine thought it’d be cool for me to check out this room on the THM platform since they know I’m really into Kubernetes and security. I thought it sounded like a fun idea, so I jumped right in! Room link: https://tryhackme.com/jr/kubernetesforyouly Okay, so I kicked things off by giving the IP address a scan, hoping to stumble upon something cool or significant. And you know what? My instincts were right on the money â€“ I actually discovered two apps listening on ports 5000 and 3000!
